”ç©¶äººå‘˜çš„èƒ½åŠ›ï¼Œä»¥æ›´å¿«åœ°åˆ›å»ºæ›´å¥½çš„è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬å¯»æ±‚ä¸€åé¢†å…ˆçš„DevSecopså·¥ç¨‹å¸ˆåŠ å…¥æˆ‘ä»¬ä¸æ–­å‘å±•çš„å›¢é˜Ÿå¹¶ä¸ºå…¶æˆåŠŸåšå‡ºè´¡çŒ®ã€‚ This role will focus on building, maintaining, and scaling the infrastructure that supports our platform and data deployments for the VIP SaaS Platform and Internal Tools and Applications.Join us in building a more sustainable world through the power of AI and scientific innovation.RequirementsKey Responsibilities Design, build, and maintain scalable and resilient infrastructure supporting data and ML workflows following standard engineering quality and architecture best practices Implement data storage and processing solutions using cloud technologies (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and cloud-agnostic deployments using Kubernetes Own security (SOC2 and ISO 27001) controls and automation using RBAC, automation, and observability best practices Configure CI and CD to automate the build, testing, and deployment of software and release management to dev/test/staging/prod environments Troubleshoot and resolve issues across infrastructure and data pipelines, optimize cluster for performance and auto-scaling Work closely with software engineers, data engineers, and research scientists to understand and support feature development Understand the pros and cons of implementation options and articulate the cost, performance, timing, and effort details Understand the market and trends in technology and architecture and propose solutions aligned to the problem at hand Collaborate with peers on ideas/solutions and provide
